alert.note: Alert for Northern Franklin; Northern St. Lawrence; Southwestern St. Lawrence (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 25 at 11:22AM EST until December 26 at 8:00AM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Freezing rain expected. Ice accumulations of 0.10 to 0.20 inches have already been reported and an additional 0.10 to 0.15 inches of ice is expected through the afternoon hours. * WHERE...Eastern Addison, eastern Rutland, Orange, and Windsor counties in Vermont. * WHEN...Until 8 AM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Difficult travel conditions will continue. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Freezing rain will continue across southeast Vermont through mid afternoon before tapering off to freezing drizzle. There have been numerous reports of icy road conditions, difficult travel, and closed roads. Expect these conditions to persist as additional ice accumulations continue.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Please allow extra time if travel is necessary.

area.areaDesc: Northern Franklin; Northern St. Lawrence; Southwestern St. Lawrence
